title: Steps of the Callejon
description: With breaktaking honesty, Steps of the Callejon takes us through the painfully beautiful, complex reality that is missions. Set in the barrios of Caracas, Venezuela, this collection of vignettes weaves together the brokenness, frustration, danger, insecurity and loneliness of Joyce Chen, a missionary seeking to help ohers while fumbling toward her own redemption.
author: Jane Zhang
